title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2603.4 - Application evaluation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2603.4 - Application evaluation

State Regulations
(a) Contract awards are based on a review of the items in section
2603.2
of this Part, including an
evaluation of: (1)
organizational
experience; (2)
proposed
program; (3)
proposed
budget; (4)
community
support; (5)
special populations; and
(6)
underserved
areas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2603.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
